DataElement.preferredName: Myeloproliferative Neoplasm Symptom Assessment Form Past Week How Much Difficulty Abdominal Pain Score 11 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of how much difficulty they had during the past week with abdominal pain, using an 11 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Myeloproliferative Neoplasm Symptom Assessment Form Past Week Quantity Difficulty Abdominal Pain Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire for monitoring the most debilitating symptoms experienced by patients with myeloproliferative neoplasms._The most recent week, including today._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved._Painful sensation in the abdominal region._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire for monitoring the most debilitating symptoms experienced by patients with myeloproliferative neoplasms.

Concepts.definition: A self-administered questionnaire for monitoring the most debilitating symptoms experienced by patients with myeloproliferative neoplasms.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Quantity Difficulty Abdominal Pain Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.:Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved.:Sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony in the abdominal region.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved.
Painful sensation in the abdominal region.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: MPN-SAF: Myeloproliferative Neoplasm Symptom Assessment Form, Scherber R, et.al.,  2011
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for OHSU study in Rave per request by L.Bradley. mc 9/29/14

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved._The act of ascertaining or fixing the value or worth of something._an ordered reference standard.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has not experienced a particular difficulty.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has not experienced a particular difficulty.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Absent To Worst Imaginable Difficulty Likert Score 1

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Absent To Worst Imaginable Difficulty Likert Score 1
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has not experienced a particular difficulty.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: A response indicating that a particular difficulty is the worst that an individual can conceive of experiencing.: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11: The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.: A subjective score of 1 on a Likert scale.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has not experienced a particular difficulty.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
A response indicating that a particular difficulty is the worst that an individual can conceive of experiencing.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.
A subjective score of 1 on a Likert scale.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that a particular difficulty is the worst that an individual can conceive of experiencing.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that a particular difficulty is the worst that an individual can conceive of experiencing.
